title: How to Change Your Avatar on PlayStation 4 to a Custom Image

steps.headline: Upload your picture onto your Facebook account.
On your PS4, go to settings, and select PSN.
Turn it back on and on your user screen your name will have your Facebook picture on top.

text: Make a Facebook account.  Upload your picture onto your Facebook account.  On your PS4, go to settings, and select PSN.  Select "Link with Other Services."  Select Facebook  Log in and confirm.  Turn off your PS4.  Turn it back on and on your user screen your name will have your Facebook picture on top.
